name: Kiwi Dip
keywords: Kiwi Dip, New Zealand, Onion Dip, Reduced Cream, Maggi Onion Soup, Party Snack, Chip Dip, Easy Appetizer, 2 Ingredient Recipe, Creamy Dip, Savory Snack, BBQ Side Dish, Traditional Kiwi Food, Quick Dip, Vegetarian, Summer Food, Finger Food, Crowd Pleaser, Picnic Food, No Bake, Onion Soup Mix
description: A classic and beloved New Zealand dip made with just two iconic ingredients: reduced cream and onion soup mix. This creamy, savory dip is the perfect accompaniment to crinkle-cut chips or vegetable sticks for any party or barbecue.
recipeIngredient: 1 250ml can Nestle Reduced Fat Cooking Cream

recipeInstructions.text: Mix ingredients together thoroughly ensuring there are no dry lumps.
recipeInstructions.name: Combine ingredients

recipeInstructions.text: Refrigerate for at least 1h, ideally 2-3, and enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Refrigerate

notes: We normally have ours with plain crinkle cut chips.
Works well with many packet soups, doesn't just have to be onion soup. Chicken and leak or mushroom goes well as well. However, onion soup is the traditional base.
Whatever you do, don't use french onion soup, it's rubbish.
The "official" recipe contains 1 tbsp of lemon but I have never done that, could be nice though!
